nodes.text: Jawaese, also referred to simply as Jawa, was the original language of the Jawas, while Jawa Trade Talk was their dialect. Scent was an integral part of Jawaese so it was impossible for non-Jawas to learn. The Bimm weapons smuggler Rycar Ryjerd spoke Jawaese.
In the films, Jawaese was produced by speeding up words and phrases spoken in the Zulu language.
